title: 【星辰坊·STAR】华美中世纪镇——Crooked Town
author: 星辰坊-STAR
txt_content:
本帖最后由 星辰坊-STAR 于 2016-2-28 16:01 编辑 
Crooked Town
                                                              ————星辰坊搬运第一版
       请关注星辰坊，优秀国外建筑搬运，打个评分，给个人气，有你的支持就有我们搬运的动力！


★作者原话★
Hello my friends !
I introduce you to one of my small medieval towns + Habor.Whats so special about the town ? Its entirely crooked / unsymmetrical.Map includes:21 different BuildingsHabor with ShipsMinecart Station with tour around the map ( Just stand on the pressurplate and hop into the cart ) Underground Trainstation ( Or in german: U-Bahn ) House of prostitution (Habor) (I removed the signs due to +18 content ) sry guys :P I hope you like it. Support me by giving me diamonds / feedback.Feel free to use the map for anything aslong you give me credit.Make sure you subscribe for more epic stuff !I used:WorldEdit, Photoshop, Chunky 
★简要介绍★这是一个一个小的中世纪城镇+港口。镇上有什么特别的吗？它完全弯曲/不对称。地图包含：21个不同的建筑物港口的船只站在矿车旅游地图地下火车站港口
★建筑截图★















如果您中意或使用了这张地图，不忘给辛苦的作者去原帖支持以下也别忘了给我们评个分，给个人气哦~！
